Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: Note to administrator: This inventory is designed to measure the grief experience of current family caregivers of a person living with progressive dementia (e.g. Alzheimer's disease). Instructions for completing the survey are provided below. Sub-scale and total grief scores are automatically calculated and displayed at the end of the survey and include reverse scoring as described in Marwit et al., "The Gerontologist," Vol 42, No. 6, 2002."
Field.ElementLabel: <u>Instructions:</u> This inventory is designed to measure the grief experience of <u>current</u> family caregivers of a person living with progressive dementia (e.g. Alzheimer's disease). Read each statement carefully, then from the list provided select the option that best describes how much you agree or disagree with what is said. Choose a number 1-5 to the right. It is important that you respond to all items so that the scores are accurate. Sub-scale and total grief scores will be automatically calculated at the end of the survey.
1. I've had to give up a great deal to be a caregiver.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 = Strongly Disagree 
 2, 2 = Disagree 
 3, 3 = Somewhat Agree 
 4, 4 = Agree 
 5, 5 = Strongly Agree

Field.ElementLabel: 2. I miss so many of the activities we used to share.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 = Strongly Disagree 
 2, 2 = Disagree 
 3, 3 = Somewhat Agree 
 4, 4 = Agree 
 5, 5 = Strongly Agree

Field.ElementLabel: 3. I feel I am losing my freedom.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 = Strongly Disagree 
 2, 2 = Disagree 
 3, 3 = Somewhat Agree 
 4, 4 = Agree 
 5, 5 = Strongly Agree

Field.ElementLabel: 4. My physical health has declined from the stress of being a caregiver.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 = Strongly Disagree 
 2, 2 = Disagree 
 3, 3 = Somewhat Agree 
 4, 4 = Agree 
 5, 5 = Strongly Agree

1, 1 = Strongly Disagree

 4, 4 = Agree

Field.ElementLabel: Personal Sacrifice Burden

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([mmcgi_sc_q1],[mmcgi_sc_q3],[mmcgi_sc_q4],[mmcgi_sc_q7],[mmcgi_sc_q11],[mmcgi_sc_q17],[mmcgi_sc_q20],[mmcgi_sc_q21],[mmcgi_sc_q25],[mmcgi_sc_q28],[mmcgi_sc_q29],[mmcgi_sc_q35],[mmcgi_sc_q39],[mmcgi_sc_q40],[mmcgi_sc_q41],[mmcgi_sc_q42],[mmcgi_sc_q44],[mmcgi_sc_q49])

Field.ElementLabel: Heartfelt Sadness and Longing

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([mmcgi_sc_q2],[mmcgi_sc_q9],[mmcgi_sc_q14],[mmcgi_sc_q15],[mmcgi_sc_q18],[mmcgi_sc_q19],[mmcgi_sc_q27],[mmcgi_sc_q30],[mmcgi_sc_q31],[mmcgi_sc_q36],[mmcgi_sc_q37],[mmcgi_sc_q38],[mmcgi_sc_q43],[mmcgi_sc_q48],[mmcgi_sc_q50])

Field.ElementLabel: Worry and Felt Isolation

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([mmcgi_sc_q5],[mmcgi_sc_q6],[mmcgi_sc_q8],[mmcgi_sc_q10],[mmcgi_sc_q12],[mmcgi_sc_q13],[mmcgi_sc_q16],[mmcgi_sc_q22],[mmcgi_sc_q23],[mmcgi_sc_q24],[mmcgi_sc_q26],[mmcgi_sc_q32],[mmcgi_sc_q33],[mmcgi_sc_q34],[mmcgi_sc_q45],[mmcgi_sc_q46],[mmcgi_sc_q47])

Field.ElementLabel: Total Grief Level

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([mmcgi_sc_score_pers_sacrifice],[mmcgi_sc_score_sad_long],[mmcgi_sc_score_worry_isolate])
